channel.title: Question on players going through certain places
channel.description: I am almost finished with my version of bounty hunter but don't know how to make it where a certain high level can go through a cave. I made it where on the first cave, you must be 3 combat :p..to enter. I want it where you must be 45 combat or lower to enter. A bit like the opposite of magic levels etc. I bet that gave everyone an idea on how to fix this :\ I'm not lazy. I don't want anyone higher than 45 getting into the first cave. Same with my other 2 caves but after someone helps solve the first one, I can get the other 2 done

the }else{ makes it 1/2 the length and is the way it should be lol

item.title: Question on players going through certain places
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

you mean,

else if (playercombat <= 45 { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; }else{ SendMessage("This cave is for players 45 combat and below only."); }

the (playercombat might be different in your server

What this (<=45) means is 45 is the max that can go in and the }else{ is if you are over 45 cb

Read full topic
item.source: Question on players going through certain places

item.title: Question on players going through certain places
item.dc:creator: @scottbenton scottbenton
item.description:
@scottbenton wrote:

if (combat <= 45) {
sendMessage(“you are above level 45 combat you may not enter.”);
}
else if (combat >= 46) {
teleportToX = ####;
teleportToY = ####;
sendMessage(“welcome to bounty hunter for level 45 and below”);
}

XD my nooby attempt hope it works

Read full topic
